game.name: 12 is Better Than 6
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 12 is Better Than 6 is a dynamic top-down shooter with stealth elements, presented in a Wild West theme. The story puts you in the shoes of escaped slave fleeing to the United States in 1873.

reviewHighlights.text: And again, nostalgia. The game is a collective image of flash games I played when I was little. The style, as if everything is drawn in a notebook, ad...
Great art style, fun gameplay, and unique setting. Highly recommended for indie fans!
